renderer::VBOUsage

renderer::VBOUsage Namespace Reference

Alias for VBOType.


Enumerations

enum  {
  STREAM_DRAW, STREAM_COPY, STREAM_READ, DYNAMIC_DRAW,
  DYNAMIC_COPY, DYNAMIC_READ, STATIC_DRAW, STATIC_READ,
  STATIC_COPY
}

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
STREAM_DRAW  Buffer data is changed rarely and used mostly for drawing.
STREAM_COPY  Buffer data is changed rarely and used mostly for data exchange.
STREAM_READ  Buffer data is changed rarely and used mostly for data reading from CPU.
DYNAMIC_DRAW  Buffer data is changed frequently and used mostly for drawing.
DYNAMIC_COPY  Buffer data is changed frequently and used mostly for data exchange.
DYNAMIC_READ  Buffer data is changed frequently and used mostly for data reading.
STATIC_DRAW  Buffer data is constant and used mostly for drawing.
STATIC_READ  Buffer data is constant and used mostly for reading.
STATIC_COPY  Buffer data is constant and used mostly for data exchange.
